org.jetel.component

Interface ComponentDescription

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphElementDescription, PluginableItemDescription
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentDescriptionImpl, ComponentDescriptionImpl.MissingComponentDescription

    public interface ComponentDescription
extends GraphElementDescription
    This is description of a component type loaded from 'component' extension point.

    • Field Detail

      • EXTENSION_POINT_ID

        static final java.lang.String EXTENSION_POINT_ID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadataProvider

        java.lang.String getMetadataProvider()
        Returns:
        class name of metadata provider or null if no provider has been specified.

      • getDescription

        ComponentDescription.Component getDescription()
        Returns:
        deep description which contains details about component, number of ports, attributes, ...

      • hasDescription

        boolean hasDescription()
        Returns:
        deep description is optional (introduced in 3.6)

      • isPassThrough

        boolean isPassThrough()
        Returns:
        true if this component propagates metadata from first input port to all output ports

      • getDefaultInputMetadataId

        java.lang.String getDefaultInputMetadataId(int portIndex)
        Returns ID of metadata associated with given port. Metadata needs to be defined statically in component description in plugin.xml Metadata ID can be used to get real metadata from MetadataRepository.

      • getDefaultOutputMetadataId

        java.lang.String getDefaultOutputMetadataId(int portIndex)
        Returns ID of metadata associated with given port. Metadata needs to be defined statically in component description in plugin.xml Metadata ID can be used to get real metadata from MetadataRepository.
